subject: Management
title: Feedback on Sensitive Topics
description: A micro-lesson that makes Feedback on Sensitive Topics usable.

hook.text: A manager needed to address body odor. He agonized for weeks. The direct conversation took three minutes.

buildup.text: Hygiene, interpersonal style, cultural differences: some feedback topics feel impossibly delicate.

discovery.text: The anticipation is always worse than the conversation itself. Awkwardness is temporary. Impact is lasting.

twist.text: Not telling someone is crueler than telling them. Everyone else already knows. They deserve to know too.

climax.text: Be private, direct, and compassionate. I'm sharing this because I respect you. Keep it short.

punchline.text: Say the awkward thing. The relief comes faster than you think.

quiz.question: Why is it important to give feedback on sensitive topics?
options: Not telling someone is crueler because everyone else usually already knows
Sensitive topics should never be addressed at work
It's always better to let someone figure it out on their own
